materials.raw_text:
Cadmium Oxide (CdO) - 20 g 
 Rubidium Carbonate (Rb2CO3) - 10 g 
 Silicon Dioxide (SiO2) - 30 g 
 Sodium Silicate (Na2SiO3) - 5 g

sourcing.instructions:
Cadmium Oxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers. 
 Rubidium Carbonate: Specialty chemical suppliers or online markets. 
 Silicon Dioxide: Available at chemical suppliers or as a silica gel. 
 Sodium Silicate: Local hardware stores or chemical suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, measure 20 g of Cadmium Oxide. 
 2. Add 10 g of Rubidium Carbonate to the bowl. 
 3. Measure 30 g of Silicon Dioxide and add it to the mixture. 
 4. Finally, add 5 g of Sodium Silicate. 
 5. Mix all ingredients thoroughly using a spatula or a mechanical mixer for 10 minutes until uniformly blended.
